position: Private Equity | Real Estate | M&A | Carbon & Impact Finance

experience.title: Vice President - Institutional Business
experience.description: CEG is a leading investment firm with offices in Dubai and Zurich. We focus on sourcing alternative co-investment strategies and corporate finance through private equity, credit vehicles, mezzanine financing and long-term loans for corporate and institutional clients.

experience.title: Assistant Vice President - Institutional Business Development
experience.description: UTI International Singapore is a subsidiary of UTI Asset Management Company, India's oldest and largest money manager. Licensed by the Monetary Authority of Singapore for fund management, the firm manages institutional money directed primarily at Indian equity and debt. Our objective is to build a global Institutional and Distribution business for our investment strategies.

positions.subtitle: RAKBANK
positions.description: Responsibilities included preliminary risk assessment and classification of SME finance clients;  and risk verification and credit review of new business finance applications.- Assessed and evaluated RAK bank portfolio of SME accounts.- Provided financial advisory and solutions to companies under stress.- Helped set up the SME Debt Restructure Department to manage financial risk  on stressed accounts on the SME portfolio.- Industry analysis and communication of finding.- Conducted credit analysis of SME clients and provided recommendations.
positions.title: Projects & Analytics
positions.description_html:
Responsibilities included preliminary risk assessment and classification of SME finance clients; and risk verification and credit review of new business finance applications.
- Assessed and evaluated RAK bank portfolio of SME accounts.
- Provided financial advisory and solutions to companies under stress.
- Helped set up the SME Debt Restructure Department to manage financial risk on stressed accounts on the SME portfolio.
- Industry analysis and communication of finding.
- Conducted credit analysis of SME clients and provided recommendations.

positions.subtitle: RAKBANK
positions.description: Responsibilities primarily encompassed sourcing clients in the SME sector for debt and trade finance facilities; addressing the business finance requirements of the present portfolio of clients; and preliminary credit analysis of SME businesses.

experience.title: Credit Research Analyst Intern
experience.description: Worked with Mashreq Capital, an Asset Management subsidiary of Mashreqbank, one of the largest banks in the UAE. Working directly under the CEO, responsibilities included:-Credit analysis of the Chinese property market- Creation of investment portfolio of companies in the industry.-Fixed income research-Macro-economic perspective on the European debt crisis.
